descriptionHtml:
================
DESCRIPTION
================
When I\'ve downloaded Dragonborn I would like to play race which 
fit to official DLC
And I decided to create Ash Elves race

Once there was country with big trees and nice places but all changed when
Red Mountain begin to eject lava and stones... 
Livers of country were Chiimers but when ash cloud hide their from the light
and all another world they \'ve changed. Their skin became grey with scars and 
cracks and marks. They called themselves - Ash Elves.
And Ash Lands they have many advantages.
There were many heroes who want to destroy Ash Elves but everybody can\'t do it.
Ash Elves can create deadly firebolt and became invisible. Also they have 
resistance to fire because they are Fireborn.
But these knowledges about them were forgotten. 
And now most of Ash Elves lives between Dark Elves. But they don\'t know about their powers.

In this mod:
-2 unique eyes variants
-Female has unique UNP body (not required)
-Unique warpaints for Males and Females


==========
INSTALL
==========
Copy all files to Data folder

===========
UNINSTALL
===========
Delete
meshes/ashelf
textures/ashelf
AshElves.esp

===========
CREDITS
===========
Big thanks to:
Yyna
TairenSoul
ClethCleth 
For mod testing and screens
author: Den987
